name: Animal Sighting Simulator
description:
As a disillusioned urbanite in a world where most animals are extinct,  your only consolation is a gaming system that simulates nature.  But thanks to your artistic vision, that's about to change. Pick your creatures and your creative medium and make your dreams come true.

Made for my first jam, the NarraScope 2020 Game Jam!

Credits:

Story/game by Amy Clare Fontaine

Made in Twine 2's Chapbook format by Chris Klimas

Audio files made with Audacity

Images courtesy of Unsplash creators

Thank you to Josh Grams and Chris Klimas for their coding suggestions!
